message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to sell you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start with an offer of $100.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I appreciate it, but I'm hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to lower the price to $85?
I understand that you're looking to stay within a budget, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $92.50
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $87.50 as my counteroffer.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I can do $90, but that's as low as I can go. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $90.
